Package com.raihanMuhammadIhsanJBusAF

Class Schedule

java.lang.Object
com.raihanMuhammadIhsanJBusAF.Schedule
public class Schedule extends Object
The Schedule class represents a schedule for a bus, including the departure timestamp and seat availability.

Instances of this class can be created with a specified departure timestamp and the number of available seats.

The class provides methods to check seat availability, book seats, and print the schedule details.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Raihan Muhammad Ihsan

  • Field Details

    • departureSchedule

      public Timestamp departureSchedule
      The timestamp of the departure schedule.

    • seatAvailability

      public Map<String,Boolean> seatAvailability
      A map representing the availability of each seat. The key is the seat identifier, and the value is a boolean indicating whether the seat is available (true) or booked (false).

  • Method Details

    • isSeatAvailable

      public boolean isSeatAvailable(String seat)
      Checks if a specific seat is available.
      Parameters:
      seat - The seat identifier.
      Returns:
      true if the seat is available, false otherwise.

    • isSeatAvailable

      public boolean isSeatAvailable(List<String> seat)
      Checks if a list of seats is available.
      Parameters:
      seat - The list of seat identifiers.
      Returns:
      true if all seats in the list are available, false otherwise.

    • bookSeat

      public void bookSeat(String seat)
      Books a specific seat.
      Parameters:
      seat - The seat identifier to be booked.

    • bookSeat

      public void bookSeat(List<String> seatList)
      Books a list of seats.
      Parameters:
      seatList - The list of seat identifiers to be booked.
